customMethods.name: setKpi1_ReferralsOverTime
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	
	
	query = """
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = ?
		
;WITH cte AS (
SELECT [Referral].[id]
, MONTH([Referral].[timeCreated]) AS [month]
, YEAR ([Referral].[timeCreated]) AS [year]
FROM [participant].[Referral]
WHERE [timeCreated] >= @dateFrom
	AND [ProviderId] = ?
)

SELECT 
	 cte.[year]
	,cte.[month]
	,COUNT(cte.[id]) as [referralPerMonth]
FROM cte
GROUP BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
ORDER BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
"""
	args = []
	################################################
	now = system.date.now()
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)
	monthStart = yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), 1)
	sixMonthsBefore = system.date.addMonths(monthStart, -5)
	args += [sixMonthsBefore]

	################################################
	providerId = payload.get('providerId')
	args += [providerId]
	#providerIds =  [9, 10, 24, 30]	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	
	
	# Examples:providerId: 9, 10, 24, 30	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 
	
	# Privide series for all 6 months even if result from DB is empty
	_values = []
	for num in range(6):
		_time = system.date.addMonths(sixMonthsBefore, num)
		_month = system.date.getMonth(_time) + 1
		_year = system.date.getYear(_time)
		#ystem.perspective.print((_time, _month, _year))
		_lst = [row['referralPerMonth'] for row in result if row['year'] == _year and row['month'] == _month]
		_val = _lst[0] if len(_lst) > 0 else 0
		
		if len(_lst) > 1:
			raise ValueError('More than one element in the list!')
	
		_values.append(dict(applicants = _val, time = _time))


	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Referrals Over Time'
	kpi1.props.params.Value = _values
